response.yaml_spec:
add_numbers:
  evals:
    IsInteger:
      type: int
    CorrectSum:
      assertion: "output == input[0] + input[1]"
    NonNegativeOnlyIfInputsAre:
      assertion: "not (input[0] > 0 and input[1] > 0) or output > 0"
    FastCalculation:
      duration: 0.001

  dataset:
    - case:
        id: positive_numbers
        inputs: [10, 20]
        expected: 30

    - case:
        id: negative_numbers
        inputs: [-5, -15]
        expected: -20

    - case:
        id: mixed_signs
        inputs: [-10, 25]
        expected: 15

    - case:
        id: zero_identity
        inputs: [0, 500]
        expected: 500

    - case:
        id: large_integers
        inputs: [1000000, 2000000]
        expected: 3000000

    - case:
        id: invalid_type_float
        inputs: [1.5, 2]
        raises: TypeError

    - case:
        id: invalid_type_string
        inputs: ["1", 2]
        raises: TypeError
